RESOLVED_ENTITIES.Government: United States Department of Homeland Security
RESOLVED_ENTITIES.the Government: United States Department of Homeland Security

AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Border Patrol: Conducts roving stops and may temporarily detain vehicles for investigation, governed by the standard articulated in the reasonable suspicion doctrine.
AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.United States Department of Homeland Sec: Prohibits unreasonable searches and seizures, responsible for enforcing immigration laws and conducting investigations.
